page.title: 14ROAD TRAFFIC IN CUCKFIELD
page.content: Cuckfield's busiest road is Broad Street, the A272 to Haywards Heath. In 1 hour approx. 370 cars and 60 lorries travel in any one direction along this road, one of the few east/west routes in Sussex. People complain a lot about lorries. We had one report of a shop window near a narrow bend cracked by the vibrations caused by a lorry. The roads are busy during the school's rush hours (8.20-8.55am and 3.00-3.45pm), when a lollipop lady helps children across the road. It is also busy after 5pm when people return from their work. A bypass is very much needed but as yet no route has been agreed upon.
